review_data.title: Love the beer... wish the kichen stayed open a bit later...
review_data.content: I just LOVE the AMBER Beer here.... It is the best Amber draft beer I have found here in Zurich. My only regret is that the kitchen stops at 21:00 and after a few beers, I would love to have another order of their french...More

review_data.title: Birra all'aperto
review_data.content: Mi sono fermato per una birra prima di cena; il locale con una bella terrazza sopra il fiume è molto...More

review_data.title: Schönes gemütliche Bar
review_data.content: Ich mag es dort! Mit viel Liebe gemacht und wirklich gemütlich. Besonders im Sommer einer meiner Lieblingsbars in Zürich

review_data.title: Nice corner bar with garden and decorations
review_data.content: Am Damm fur Dich is located under the Wipkingen train tracks and brings back memories of sitting or walking under the vibrating train tracks of Brooklyn. This corner bar/café has indoor wooden tables and chairs, padded benches beside the bar and the most popular spot...More

review_data.title: Faire und entspanntes Ausgehen
review_data.content: Im Damm kann man entspannt ausgehen. Obwohl das Preisniveau sehr fair ist, ist es immer wieder sehr interessant neue Getränke...More

review_data.title: Cool garden bar / hangout!
review_data.content: I cam here just for some drinks. I liked the atmosphere, the original and cool look, the garden, and the staff are friendly.

review_data.title: must visit
review_data.content: Second (or first) best bar in Wipkingen area. Very nice beer garden, cozy inside and very friendly staff. Perfect place for summer evenings but during winter good as well. Place to be!

review_data.title: Nette Quartierbeiz an der Limit
review_data.content: Nette Quartierbeiz an der Limit im Trendquartier Wipkingen. Die Lokalität ist ein Ableger vom Kai fürDich. Nette Aussenbereich für einen...More
